Quizs.question: 1. C99 standard guarantees uniqueness of __________ characters for internal names.
Quizs.explaination: Explanation: ISO C99 compiler may consider only first 63 characters for internal names.

Quizs.question: 2. C99 standard guarantees uniqueness of ___________ characters for external names.
Quizs.explaination: Explanation: ISO C99 compiler may consider only first 31 characters for external names.
